title: Amazon to Let Prime Members Download Videos
text:
Yahoo CEO Marissa Mayer Announces She's Pregnant With Twins 2 September, 2015 
Yahoo CEO Marissa Mayer said Monday that she is pregnant and expects to give birth to identical twin girls around December. The 40-year-old CEO wrote in a Tumblr post that she had already informed... More Don't Be Late To Stephen Colbert 2 September, 2015 
Can't wait 'til Stephen Colbert's Late Show Premiere? No problem. Get Waze, the navigation app and let Colbert tell you where to go. Waze uses crowdsourcing to find the best route to your destination.... More A Typographer Tells Us What Google's New Logo Says About Google 2 September, 2015 
If it wasn’t already clear, Google is in the midst of a major makeover. Last month, the company announced that it would reorganize as Alphabet, a wide ranging “collection of companies”... More
